title: I adored this!

embed.description: Listen as Lars spins a tale of four Bilgewater legends - Nautilus, Fizz, Tahm Kench, and Pyke - and discovers the terrifying fact woven into his fiction. Click on the links below for more.

body:
This is exactly what we needed. I've always loved audio dramas and this is no exception!
Both the writing team  and the sound team did absolutely incredible jobs working on this, not to mention Lars' voice actor (who is probably one of the best I've heard, he conveyed the stories absolutely perfectly) There were a few nit picks e.g. In part 3 Lars responding to children sound effects kind of ruined the immersion (but this is just a minor nitpick). 
Again, props to everyone who worked on this, I'd love to see more Lore in this format since it provides us a perspective on how people within the world view the champions without knowing their backstories.

replies.body: Thank you for the kind words! We're so happy you enjoyed the audio dramas! It was fun to work on and exciting to tell new stories in new ways.
